column4: Requested download is not authorized for use with this tracker. <-- i'm getting that when i try to download 10.10 through transmission
i'm successfully downloading using utorrent from my desktop at home, but getting that error from a server out in the internets.
i wonder if it could be a tracker load thing
the http download is working, p2p isn't..... whats the use of p2p if the tracker also overloads?
